sen.j: 御室仁和寺駅（おむろにんなじえき）は、京都市右京区御室小松町にある京福電気鉄道京福電気鉄道北野線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Omuro Komatsuno-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Omuro-Ninnaji Station is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
Omuro-Ninnaji Station, located in Omuro Komatsuno-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
Omuro-Ninnaji Station, located in Omuro Komatsuno-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 2007年3月18日までの駅名は「御室駅」（おむろえき）。
sen.e: Its old name up to March 18, 2007 was Omuro Station.
Prior to March 18, 2007, it was called Omuro Station.
Prior to March 18, 2007, it was called Omuro Station.

sen.j: 駅ナンバリングはB5。
sen.e: Its station number is B5.
Its station number is B5.
Its station number is B5.

sen.j: その名のとおり世界遺産仁和寺の最寄り駅であり、駅前から仁和寺の山門である「二王門」が見える。
sen.e: As its name suggests, this station is the nearest station to the Ninna-ji Temple, a World Heritage site, and the Nio-mon Gate, its temple gate, can be seen from the station.
As its name suggests, this is the nearest station to Ninna-ji Temple, a World Heritage site, and the Nio-mon Gate, its temple gate, can be seen from the station.
As its name suggests, this is the nearest station to Ninna-ji Temple, a World Heritage site, and the Nio-mon Gate, its temple gate, can be seen from the station.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線プラットホームを持つ列車交換が可能な地上駅。
sen.e: It is an aboveground station having two bar-like structure platforms, only one side of which is used for boarding and exiting trains, and the up train and down train can pass each other at this station.

It's an aboveground station having two platforms of bar-like structure, only one side of which is used for boarding and exiting trains; thus the up trains and down trains can pass one another at this station.
It's an aboveground station having two platforms serving two tracks; the inbound trains and outbound trains can pass one another at this station.
sen.cmt: two platforms serving two tracks と統一しました。上り、下り→inbound, outbound としました。

sen.j: 北野白梅町駅方面行きホームにのみ駅舎がある。
sen.e: The station building is present only on the side of the platform for Kitano Hakubaicho Station.
The station building is present only on the side of the platform for Kitano Hakubaicho Station.
The station building is present only on the side of the platform for Kitano-Hakubaicho Station.
sen.cmt: 京福のサイトより、Kitano-Hakubaicho としました。

sen.j: 駅舎には改札口や出札口もあるが、現在は無人駅であり通常は使用されていない。
sen.e: Although the station has a ticket wicket and a ticket window, it is now an unmanned station, and thus the ticket wicket and the ticket window are usually not used.
Although the station has a ticket wicket and a ticket window, it's now an unmanned station so those windows aren't normally used.
Although the station has a ticket gate and a ticket window, it's now an unmanned station so those windows aren't normally used.
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gateとしました。

sen.j: だが、仁和寺の「さくらまつり」の時期など、特に混雑が予想される場合は、集札業務を行うこともある。
sen.e: However, there are some cases where tickets are collected when congestion is expected for, for example, the "Sakura Matsuri Festival" of the Ninna-ji Temple.
However, occasionally tickets are collected when congestion is expected, such as during the "Sakura Matsuri Festival" of Ninna-ji Temple.
However, occasionally tickets are collected when congestion is expected, such as during the 'Sakura Matsuri Festival' (cherry blossoms festival) of Ninna-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: さくらまつり の補足を追加しました。

sen.j: この場合、改札口にスルッとKANSAI用のカード読み取り機が設置される。
sen.e: In these cases, a card reader for KANSAI THRU PASS is installed at the ticket wicket.
sen.cmt: 「カード読み取り機」は1台のみ設置されるという判断を致しました。
sen.e: Accordingly, a card reader for KANSAI THRU PASS is installed at the ticket wicket.
Accordingly, a card reader for KANSAI THRU PASS is installed at the ticket gate.
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gateとしました。

sen.j: なお、出札口は「のりばご案内」の掲示板で塞がれている。
sen.e: Incidentally, the ticket window is hidden with a platform information board.
Incidentally, the ticket window is hidden by a platform information board.
Incidentally, the ticket window is hidden by a platform information board.

sen.j: 駅舎正面に掲げられた額には御室仁和寺駅に改称になったあとも「驛室御」と旧字体・右横書きの旧駅名が掲げられたままである。
sen.e: The old station name "Omuro Station," which is written in old Japanese type and style, is still framed and hanged in on the front wall of the station, even after the station name was changed to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.

The facility's former name, "Omuro Station," which is written in old Japanese type and style, is still framed and hangs on the front wall of the station despite the change of name to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.

The facility's former name, 'Omuro Station,' which is written in old Japanese type and style (in which the characters are written from right to left), is still framed and hangs on the front wall of the station despite the change of name to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.
sen.cmt: " → ' としました。右横書き を補足しました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Ninna-ji Temple

sen.j: 京福御室駅前バス停（廃止）
sen.e: Keifuku Omuro-ekimae Bus Stop (discontinued)
Keifuku Omuro-ekimae Bus Stop (discontinued)
Keifuku Omuro-ekimae (in front of Omuro Station) Bus Stop (discontinued)

sen.j: 京都バス
sen.e: Kyoto Bus
Kyoto Bus
Kyoto Bus

sen.j: 発着するバスは非常に少ないながら京都駅からのバスが運行（当所終着の便のみで当所発の便はなし）されていたが、2007年7月に廃止された。
sen.e: In a few bus services available at this bus stop, services from Kyoto Station used to be operated but were discontinued in July 2007.
Of the various bus services available at this stop, services from Kyoto Station used to be provided but were discontinued in July 2007.

Of the few bus services available at this stop, services from Kyoto Station used to be provided (only buses that terminated at this station were in operation; those departing from this station were not available) but were discontinued in July 2007.
sen.cmt: various→ few に変更しました。カッコ内の翻訳を追加しました。

sen.j: 御室仁和寺バス停
sen.e: Omuro Ninnaji Bus Stop
Omuro Ninnaji Bus Stop
Omuro Ninnaji Bus Stop

sen.j: 北に200メートルほど歩いたところにある仁和寺の山門前にある。
sen.e: It is located in front of the temple gate of the Ninna-ji Temple, about a 200-meter walk to the north from the station.
It's located in front of the temple gate of Ninna-ji Temple, a walk of approximately 200 meters north from the station.
It's located in front of the temple gate of Ninna-ji Temple, a walk of approximately 200 meters north from the station.

sen.j: 京都市営バス
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus
sen.cmt: 「 Co.,Ltd.」は意図的に省きました。
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus
Kyoto City Bus

sen.j: 西日本ジェイアールバス
sen.e: West JR Bus Company
West JR Bus Company
West JR Bus Company

sen.j: 京都バスは土休日のみ京都駅前からの到着便が1本だけ運行。
sen.e: Kyoto Bus provides only one bus service which comes from Kyoto Station only on Saturdays and holidays.
Kyoto Bus provides only one bus service, which comes from Kyoto Station on Saturdays and holidays.
Kyoto Bus provides only one bus service, which comes from Kyoto Station on Saturdays and holidays.

sen.j: 1925年（大正14年）11月3日 京都電燈の御室駅として開業。
sen.e: November 3, 1925: Started as Omuro Station operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power corporation.
November 3, 1925: The facility started as Omuro Station, being operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power corporation.
November 3, 1925: The facility started as Omuro Station, being operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power company.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一し、electric power company としました。

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）3月2日 路線継承により京福電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: March 2, 1942: It became a station under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company succeeded the railway.
March 2, 1942: It became a station under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company that succeeded to the railway.
March 2, 1942: It became a station under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company that succeeded to the railway.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）3月19日 御室仁和寺駅に改称。
sen.e: March 19, 2007: The station name was changed to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.
March 19, 2007: The facility's name was changed to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.
March 19, 2007: The facility's name was changed to Omuro-Ninnaji Station.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 京福電気鉄道
sen.e: Keifuku Electric Railroad

sen.j: 妙心寺駅 B6 - 御室仁和寺駅 B5 - 宇多野駅 B4
sen.e: Myoshinji Station B6 - Omuro-Ninnaji Station B5 - Utano Station B4
Myoshinji Station B6 - Omuro-Ninnaji Station B5 - Utano Station B4
